backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with maps for journeys, locations, users, ratings, media, schedules, bookmarks, and cities, along with all related data types.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping requested UI changes to affected frontend files with metadata and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose and recent enhancements.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React app and includes the suncalc script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up providers and renders the main LocationMapExplorer along with the BackendDebugger and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Implements an admin panel for managing journeys and schedules with calendar popovers, forms, and CRUD operations.
Exposes the backend actor to the browser console for debugging, showing principal info and temporary admin utilities.
frontend/src/components/CityAlbumManager: Manages city albums with media uploads, social links, validation, and integration with backend queries and file storage.
frontend/src/components/CityloguePanel.t: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/GeonameGeographi: Provides UI to import, browse, search, create, update, and delete Geoname city records with pagination and file parsing.
frontend/src/components/HeartRating.tsx: Interactive 10-heart rating component supporting partial fills, hover effects, and optional read-only mode.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveGlobe: Large 3D globe component using Three.js with layers, labels, animations, timezone overlays, and flight path visualization.
frontend/src/components/LocationInfoDial: Dialog for uploading, previewing, saving, updating, or deleting a photo tied to a specific location's metadata.
frontend/src/components/LoginPanel.tsx: Authentication panel handling login/logout with Internet Identity, status display, and UI dialog interactions.
frontend/src/components/MapComponent.tsx: Interactive Leaflet-based map component that loads markers for travel spots, bookmarks, and schedule items with custom icons and popups.
frontend/src/components/MediaGalleryPopu: Displays photos, videos, and social media embeds in tabbed gallery with utilities for parsing YouTube and Instagram links.
frontend/src/components/MusicAlbumManage: Admin interface for creating, editing, and deleting music albums and songs with file upload support.
frontend/src/components/MusicPanel.tsx: Dialog-based UI for browsing music albums and selecting songs, showing albums, songs, and playback status.
frontend/src/components/MusicPlayerBar.t: Audio player bar that plays songs from albums, handles playback controls, volume, and integration with user preferences.
frontend/src/components/TimezoneManageme: Provides UI to upload, validate, store, and manually execute syncing of timezone GeoJSON data using backend and IndexedDB.
Displays journeys and itineraries with collapsible schedules, editing tools, filtering, and optional flight animation callbacks.
frontend/src/components/TravelSpotManage: Manages creation, editing, deletion, media uploads, and social links for travel spots with city filtering and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/VibesPanel.tsx: Shows combined travel spots and bookmarks grouped by city and type, with expandable sections and item-type icons.
frontend/src/components/WebsiteLayoutPan: Provides a dialog for editing website layout preferences such as map settings, display options, and music player toggle.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the userâ€™s identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks and utilities for backend interactions, including geocoding, country name normalization, and social media URL validation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining CSS variables, light/dark themes, and specific heading and layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/solarCalculations.ts: Provides a function to compute solar declination by day of year and includes console-based test cases.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneOffsetUtils.ts: Utility for retrieving timezone IDs matching a given UTC offset using Intl-based DST-aware calculations.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneUtils.ts: Provides utilities for loading, caching, and validating timezone GeoJSON data using IndexedDB and optional backend fetching.
frontend/src/lib/TzOverlayV2.ts: Implements timezone overlay rendering on a 3D globe with quarter-hour offset handling and geometry utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CountryMapExplorer.ts: Empty placeholder page component with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/pages/LocationMapExplorer.t: Implements an interactive 2D/3D map explorer with search, panels, overlays, and various UI controls.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining themes, colors, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, and issue tracking state.
